shovel.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a tool with a rounded blade and a long handle used for moving earth, stones etc
shovel.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a part of a large vehicle or machine used for moving or digging earth
shovel.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to lift and move earth, stones etc with a shovel
shovel.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The workmen shovelled gravel onto the road.
They were out in freezing conditions shovelling snow off the pitch.
Everyone was out shoveling their sidewalks.
